title: Review Estoppel Certificates
description: As part of due diligence for a commercial property purchase, the buyer's agent must collect and review estoppel certificates from all tenants.

tasks.description: Send estoppel certificate forms to all tenants for their signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: All tenants receive the form to be completed.

tasks.description: Collect the signed estoppel certificates from the tenants.
tasks.expected_outcome: Signed certificates are received from all tenants.

tasks.description: Review each certificate to confirm key lease terms (e.g., rent, term, security deposit) and ensure the tenant is not claiming any defaults by the landlord.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies that the tenants' understanding of the lease matches the lease documents, satisfying the due diligence contingency.
